meaningMnemonic: You're trying to open the <radical>lid</radical> of a manhole that's covered in <radical>ice</radical> by <radical>jackhammer</radical>ing it a bunch of <radical>times</radical> but it's not working because it's just too <kanji>cold</kanji>. It's so cold that your jackhammer is starting to ice up too. But you need to get this lid open so you try time after time after time!
readingMnemonic: Each time the jackhammer hits the freezing <kanji>cold</kanji> ice it makes a high pitched <reading>rin</reading>ging (りん) sound. It's actually really annoying to listen to but you really need to crack this ice open so you have to keep listening to it.
